General.Name: Plascar Participações Industriais S.A
General.Description: Plascar Participações Industriais S.A., through its subsidiary, manufactures and sells internal and external finishing of motor vehicles in Brazil. The company's products include bumpers, dashboards, air diffusers, cup holders, parcel racks, door trim panels, and other components. Plascar Participações Industriais S.A. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Jundiaí, Brazil. Plascar Participações Industriais S.A. is a subsidiary of Padua IV Participações S.A.
